title: Denali National Park & Preserve: General Management Plan
body: Consolidated General Management Plan       The General Management Plan (GMP) for Denali National Park and Preserve consists of an original 1986 GMP and three major amendments addressing the park entrance area and road corridor, south side development, and backcountry management. Consolidated General Management Plan - A large (9 mb) PDF download containing the GMP and all three major amendment plans described lower on this page.  1986 General Management Plan - A separate page describing the 1986 plan and offering downloads of specific sections of the plan.   Entrance Area and Road Corridor Development Concept Plan (1997)   Final Entrance Area and Road Corridor DCP Record of Decision    South Side Denali Development Concept Plan (1997)  Final Plan and Environmental Impact Statement Record of Decision    Backcountry Management Plan (2006)   Summary Document Final Backcountry Management Plan & EIS Public Comment, Appendices, & Index Record of Decision Revised Draft Backcountry Management Plan
